price: Kemudian, sesungguhnya Tuhan-mu (mengampuni) bagi orang-orang yang mengerjakan kesalahan karena kebodohannya, kemudian mereka bertobat sesudah itu dan memperbaiki (dirinya); sesungguhnya Tuhan-mu sesudah itu benar-benar Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِجَهَٰلَةٖ ثُمَّ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُوٓاْ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna rabbaka lilladhīna ʿamilū al-sūa bijahālatin thumma tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū inna rabbaka min baʿdihā laghafūrun raḥīmun
